# Element Plus - A Vue 3 based component library

- Element Plus is a Vue 3 based component library for developers, designers and product managers, with a set of high-quality components and rich features for building modern web applications.

## Documentation

- [Affix](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/affix)
- [Alert](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/alert)
- [Anchor](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/anchor)
- [Autocomplete](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/autocomplete)
- [Avatar](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/avatar)
- [Backtop](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/backtop)
- [Badge](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/badge)
- [Border](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/border)
